notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: J.W., T.S. and L.Z. designed the study; L.Z., J.Y., Y.S., L.L., Q.G., M.K., C.K. and T.S. collected samples and performed genome sequencing; J.L. and L.Y. analyzed data; J.L., L.Y. and L.Z. interpreted data; J.L. and L.Y. prepared the figures; and J.L., J.P., L.Y. and J.W. wrote the article.
